title: sharavaNabhavanE
sahitya:
sharavaNabhavanE sankaTa haraNE aravaNaippAi ennai ayyanE Om


anupallavi

  parama krpAkaranE bhakta paripAlanE pAril unakku nigar vErillaiyE Om


caraNam    arumai mighunda un Atralaip-pOTruvEn perumai serindiDum pugazhinai sATruvEn
karuNai purindennai kaDaittETriDa unai sharaNam aDaindEn ittaruNam ayyE Om
